mechanics.condition: Level is 4 OR Level is 8 OR Level is 12 OR Level is 16 OR Level is 19
mechanics.outcome: Player Character gains an Ability Score Improvement (ASI) opportunity

mechanics.trigger: Using an Ability Score Improvement opportunity
mechanics.condition: Player chooses to increase one ability score

mechanics.trigger: Using an Ability Score Improvement opportunity
mechanics.condition: Player chooses to increase two different ability scores
mechanics.outcome: First selected ability score increases by 1 AND Second selected ability score increases by 1

mechanics.condition: Increasing an ability score would result in it exceeding 20
mechanics.outcome: The ability score cannot be increased above 20 by this feature

description_text: When you reach 4th level, and again at 8th, 12th, 16th, and 19th level, you can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. As normal, you can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.
